short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatic and Manual crawling of e-commerce data.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a tool for crawling e-commerce product information, which can help you quickly gather any information you want.Data scraping can be completed with just a mouse click or simple text input.Automatic scraping for Amazon, eBay, and Walmart.Supports custom scraping rules, allowing you to scrape any similar website.
